name: OGA Universe
description:
Control Sara, the guardian of the OGA universe, collect the missing pieces and defeat the powerful bosses awaiting in the evil universe. This game is a tribute to opengameart.org a great page to get open source assets who helped me with some personal project. 

Thank you very much to all the opengameart community.

Most of the assets of this game are taken from https://opengameart.org

Assets Atributtions:

+Dragon Animated Sprite
  Author: David Garay Salazar & Nirdia Entertainment
  Attribution: www.nirdia.com
